author: Al Jazeera
title: Global surge of domestic violence since coronavirus lockdowns
description: UN chief calls on governments to step up prosecution of abusers and set up emergency-warning systems in pharmacies.
content:
UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres warned of a "horrifying global surge" in domestic violence during the coronavirus crisis and urged governments to step up efforts to prevent violence against women.
